description: Restore an OpenProject package-based installation from a timestamped backup set (database, attachments, configuration, and repositories).

timestamp.description: Backup timestamp to restore (e.g. 20191119210038). Must match the suffix of the backup files in backup_dir.

backup_dir.description: Directory where OpenProject backup files are stored.

pg_no_owner.description: Pass --no-owner to pg_restore. Required when restoring to a database with a different owner than the original.
